string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Everything we do is practice for something greater than where we currently are. Practice only makes for improvement. - Les Brown
Practice like you\'ve never won. Perform like you\'ve never lost. - Michael Jordan
Practice like it means everything in the world to you. Perform like you don\'t give a damn. - Jascha Heifetz
The most perfect technique is that which is not noticed at all. - Pablo Casals
I think it\'s beautiful to practice. I love to practice. - Claudio Arrau
When I am playing, I am in ecstasy; that is what I live for. - Claudio Arrau
The art of interpretation is not to play what is written. - Pablo Casals
Making mistakes is not my enemy... fear of making mistakes is my enemy - Anne Shih
Sweat more in practise, bleed less in war. - Spartan Warrior Credo
Practice is the best of all instructors - Publius Syrus
Great thoughts reduced to practice become great acts - William Hazlitt
You can\'t hire someone to practice for you. - H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them. - Aristotle
I don\'t know if I practiced more than anybody, but I sure practiced enough. I still wonder if somebody — somewhere — was practicing more than me. - Larry Bird
Sincere practice, makes the impossible possible. - Dada Vaswani
Champions keep playing until they get it right. - Billie Jean King
You are what you practice most. - Richard Carlson
Don\'t get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water. - Bruce Lee
Determination, effort, and practice are rewarded with success. - Mary Lydon Simonsen
The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark. - Michelangelo
Practice without improvement is meaningless. - Chuck Knox
Tomorrow\'s victory is today\'s practice. - Chris Bradford
Practice the way you want to perform. Practice as if you were performing. - Master Advice
If you don\'t believe you are the best, then you will never achieve all that you are capable of. - Cristiano Ronaldo
They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they\'d make up their minds. - Winston Churchill
To become really good at anything, you have to practice and repeat, practice and repeat, until the technique becomes intuitive. - Paulo Coelho
Persistence, persistence, and persistence. The power can be created and maintained through daily practice - continuous effort. - Bruce Lee
If you don\'t practice, you don\'t deserve to win. - Andre Agassi
Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you\'re willing to practice, you can do. - Bob Ross
Practice like you\'ve never won. Play like you\'ve never lost. - Michael Jordan
Experts were once amateurs who kept practicing. - Amit Kalantri
I\'ve always considered myself to be just average talent and what I have is a ridiculous insane obsessiveness for practice and preparation. - Will Smith
I do not play this instrument so well as I should wish to, but I have always supposed that to be my own fault because I would not take the trouble of practicing. - Jane Austen
Practice makes permanent, not perfect. If you practice the wrong thing, you make the wrong act permanent. - Hamza Yusuf
You don\'t learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and falling over. - Richard Branson
Practice every time you get a chance. - Bill Monroe
Amateurs practice until they get it right, experts practice until they can\'t get it wrong. - Julie Andrews
You always have to be on edge. You always have to take every practice, every game, like it is your last. - Kobe Bryant
Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice. - Anton Chekhov
Sketching on a regular basis requires you to pay close attention to the visual world around you. With practice, you begin to see things you never noticed before. - Paul Laseau
In previous years I was so fired up at times I made little mistakes. So I kept telling myself to be patient, relax, play like you do in practice. - Randall Cunningham

You can practice shooting eight hours a day, but if your technique is wrong, then all you become is very good at shooting the wrong way. Get the fundamentals down and the level of everything you do will rise. - Michael Jordan
It is performance ready if you can play 7 times without error. If you mess up on the 6th run through, you have to start over. - Musician Truth
Talent without working hard is nothing. - Cristiano Ronaldo
Do or do not, there is no try. - Yoda
It takes a long time to sound like yourself - Miles Davis
Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the ax. - Abraham Lincoln
The goal of practice is always to keep our beginner\'s mind. - Jack Kornfield
If you think you can or you think you can\'t, you\'re right. - Henry Ford
Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect. - Vince Lombardi
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn\'t work hard. - Unknown
I\'m a strong believer that you practice like you play, little things make big things happen. - Tony Dorsett
I am one of those who will go on doing till all doings are at an end. - Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
The better voice doesn\'t mean being a better singer. - Luciano Pavarotti
The rivalry is with ourself. I try to be better than is possible. I fight against myself, not against the other. - Luciano Pavarotti
If I don\'t practice one day, I know it; two days, the critics know it; three days, the public knows it. - Jascha Heifetz
The most important thing to do is really listen. - Itzhak Perlman
Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity, because if you\'re passionate about something, then you\'re more willing to take risks. - Yo-Yo Ma
A wrong note played with the right intention is much to be preferred to the right note played with no soul. - Janine Jansen

If you\'re playing within your capability, what\'s the point? If you\'re not pushing your own technique to its own limits with the risk that it might just crumble at any moment, then you\'re not really doing your job. - Nigel Kennedy
My dear hands. Farewell, my poor hands. - Sergei Rachmaninov
Simplicity is the highest goal, achievable when you have overcome all difficulties. - Frederic Chopin
To play without passion is inexcusable! - Ludwig van Beeethoven
An artist is someone who has learned to trust in himself. - Ludwig van Beethoven
Play always as if in the presence of a master. - Robert Schumann
You have to put in the hours because there\'s always something which you can improve. - Roger Federer
Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience. - Hyman Rickover
If I thought of gymnastics as a job, it would put too much stress on me ... At the end of the day, if I can say I had fun, it was a good day. - Simone Biles
You can\'t jump from little things to big things. It just takes time and patience. - Nadia Comaneci
It\'s very hard to get to the top. It\'s hardest to stay at the top. - Nadia Comaneci
I want to be able to look back and say, I\'ve done everything I can, and I was successful.\' I don\'t want to look back and say I should have done this or that. - Michael Phelps
I think goals should never be easy. They should force you to work, even if they are uncomfortable at the time. - Michael Phelps
If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren\'t willing to do. - Michael Phelps
You can\'t put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get. - Michael Phelps
Tough times don\'t last — tough people do! - Dan Peña
Don\'t just work longer hours, \'staying busy\' as most other people do. \'Work smart\' i.e. Stay productive and don\'t get distracted. - Dan Peña
Just doing as well as you did last time is not good enough. - Michael Jackson
Practice means to perform, over and over again in the face of all obstacles, some act of vision, of faith, of desire. Practice is a means of inviting the perfection desired. - Martha Graham
The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work. - Michael Jackson
Do not go to bed until you have gone over the day three times in your mind. What wrong did I do? What good did I accomplish? What did I forget to do? - Pythagoras
Knowledge is not skill. Knowledge plus ten thousand times is skill. - Sinichi Suzuki
If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you will never get it done. - Bruce Lee
Your mind must get there before your fingers will. - Musicians Truth
One thing I have learned is that I\'m not the owner of my talent; I\'m the manager of it. - Madonna
Write down specific measurable goals, and check them off as you achieve them. - Master advice
If you practice correctly from the beginning, you will save yourself a lot of time and frustration later on. Don\'t practice bad habits! - Master advice
Find a way to make your practice routine exciting! And when it isn\'t exciting anymore, change up the routine. - Master advice
No matter how you feel, get up, dress up, show up, and practice. - Master advice
When you are not practising, someone else is getting better. - Allen Iverson
Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another. - John Dewey
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible. - Tony Robbins
I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times. - Bruce Lee
Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it. - Bruce Lee

If I wanted to play the violin, I had to work. Because anything that one wants to do really, and one loves doing, one must do everyday. It should be as easy to the artist and as natural as flying is to a bird. And you can\'t imagine a bird saying well, I\'m tired today, I\'m not going to fly! - Yehudi Menuhin
One must always practice slowly. If you learn something slowly, you forget it slowly. - Itzhak Perlman
Quick music sounds dull unless every note is articulated. - Herbert von Karajan
It is only through failure and through experiment that we learn and grow. - Isaac Stern
